Hero.title: Fullstack WebDev with Passion
Hero.description: I develop modern, accessible and performant web applications that inspire.

About.title: About me
About.paragraph1: As a passionate fullstack developer, I combine technical expertise with creative design. My focus is on developing applications that are not only functional, but also intuitive and accessible.
About.paragraph2: With several years of experience in modern web technologies, I develop customized solutions that meet the individual requirements of my clients.

ecommerce.title: E-Commerce Platform

dashboard.title: SaaS Dashboard
dashboard.description: Modern admin dashboard with real-time data visualization

mobileApp.description: Progressive web app for fitness tracking with offline functionality
